sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import axios from 'axios'; import { find } from "lodash"; import { useHistory } from "react-router-dom"; import { Map, GoogleApiWrapper } from 'google-maps-react'; function Profile() { const mapStyles = { width: '100%', height: '100%' }; const [user, setUser] = useState({}); const history = useHistory(); const apiURL = "https://panorbit.in/api/users.json"; const fetchProfileDetails = async () => { let response = await axios.get(apiURL); if (response) { let id = history.location.state.user_id; let user = find(response.data.users, ['id', id]); setUser(user); } } useEffect(() => { fetchProfileDetails(); }, []); return (
Profile Posts Gallery ToDo
Profile Posts Gallery ToDo
Profile
{/** open when clicked on username **/ //
// Your Profile // Settings // Sign out //
}
{user && (

{user.name}

Username :

{user.username}

email :

{user.email}

Phone :

{user.phone}

Website :

{user.website}

Company

Name:

{user.company && user.company.name}

catchPhrase:

{user.company && user.company.catchPhrase}

bs:

{user.company && user.company.bs}
Address

Street:

{user.address && user.address.street}

Suite:

{user.address && user.address.suite}

City:

{user.address && user.address.city}

Zipcode:

{user.address && user.address.zipcode}
)}
) } export default Profile;
